user_instruction: 'Respond to Alex'"'"'s request for background info (alex@freelancedesign.com). You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Background Materials Needed for Alex’s Design Work

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well! Alex (alex@freelancedesign.com), our freelance designer for the upcoming product launch, has asked for comprehensive background information so he can start developing the marketing collateral.

Could you kindly gather and share the following?

• Product overview deck and one-page summary  
• Brand guidelines (logo files, color palette, typography)  
• Key messaging / positioning statements  
• Target customer personas and market research highlights  
• Launch timeline, major milestones, and any critical deadlines  
• Existing creative assets or mood boards that might be helpful  
• Internal reviewer list or approval flow (if available)

Most of this should be in your Gmail threads with the product team and the “New Product Launch” workspace in Notion. If any of it is already scheduled on the calendar (e.g., briefings or review meetings), please point me to those invites as well.

It would be ideal if we could provide these materials to Alex by end of day tomorrow so he can stay on track.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]
